lines.text: All that ash- there was probably a lot of smoke, too.
Sure was. You got here late, but this place smelled awful when we showed up.
So... maybe the fire itself interfered.
If he got a lungful of smoke, he might've been too busy coughing to cast the spell.
I get the feelin' there's a <c=#FF00FF>more direct</c> explanation, though.
